articles.content: In reality, the much-heralded rush back to retail seems quite tremulous. Footfall on Monday was up 40-45 per cent on the week before, according to data from Springboard. It will take a lot more than … [+1330 chars]

articles.title: Drive: Porsche Cayman GT4 Clubsport takes on Silverstone - Autocar
articles.description: For serious racing and track-day fun, this amped-up 718 Cayman delivers - in spades. We drive it on Britain's most famous circuit
articles.content: The entire interior has been ripped out, leaving just the basic shape of the dashboard, some switches and the column stalks to remind you which make of car youre in. A brilliantly clear Cosworth data… [+2378 chars]

articles.title: This new Amazon Web Services computer is near indestructible and almost as light as a laptop - TechRadar

articles.content:
Amazon Web Services has launched yet another product that it hopes will help customers add even more data to its cloud storage
